It's important today.

  • Shogu: Ukraine is throwing up recent reserves

  • The Ukrainian journalist Butusov claimed the imminent resignation of the Zalemen

  • Legate income: how to become self-employed in 2024

  • Governor Andrei Travnikov approved a plan for a family year in Novosibir province

  • In Novosibir province, 35 modernized post offices were opened

  • The Government of London has declared an intransigent fight against clops.

  • Mayor Kiev Klićko said that there was a need for new mobilization for military rotation.

  • Orban told me what the money allocated to Ukraine would go for.

  • Germany is helping to build a defence line

  • A VSO officer has made a strong demand to the Kenyan authorities

  • Anti-Government rallies in Slovakia

Media news2

Cases

02.02.2024 12:23

Two people died and 170 injured in a gas station explosion in Kenya

Rescue work continues on the ground.

02.02.2024 23:54

FSB launched a search for Ukrainian hacker to collect data on Russian facilities.

A Ukrainian citizen, Roman Orlenko, hacker, was wanted by Russian intelligence agencies to collect data on infrastructure facilities in the Russian Federation.

02.02.2024 23:24

In Rostov, a group of three persons assisted irregular migrants in obtaining documents

In Rostov, the Ministry of Internal Affairs, together with FSB, interrupted the activities of a group of illegal migrations.

02.02.2024 22:37

In Petersburg, the drunk head of the department of the administration tried to leave the accident on the broken Volvo.

On Thursday, 1 February, GIBD personnel at the scene of the accident on the street in Petersburg found a Volvo driver who tried to hide in a car with a wheel.

02.02.2024 22:11

In Gatchin, the mother and four children lived with the mummy of the head of the family.

In Gatchin, a large family has lived with a man's mummy for years.

02.02.2024 13:56

The man received a contusion during the shelling of the Kursk region.

As noted by the Governor of the region, the victim ' s house was severely damaged.

02.02.2024 13:50

There was a major fire in the correctional colony in Solicamsk.

Firefighters protect the fire next to the burning building.

02.02.2024 13:41

In Novosibirsk, a serious fire occurred on Wattine

Fortunately, there were no casualties.

02.02.2024 13:36

There's a passenger bus on the way to Saratov.

The passengers were evacuated on their own, no one was injured.

02.02.2024 13:30

2 billion roubles were seized in Petersburg

It is noted that criminal proceedings have been instituted under article 228.1 (5) of the Criminal Code.

02.02.2024 13:25

In Lower Tagil, a man sent a naked picture of his son as a friend and entered the article.

In the case of a man, criminal proceedings were instituted for the use of a minor for pornography.

02.02.2024 13:08

In Tumen province, three people died on death routes

Traffic on the scene is limited, reversing one lane in two directions.

02.02.2024 13:02

The police began to check after the discovery of the mummy, a man in a private house in Len regionalia

Investigators have begun to establish the circumstances.

02.02.2024 12:57

In Sverdlov province, a large-scale mother died after the death of her husband on the SVR.

According to the sister of the deceased woman, apart from the report in WhatsApp, there is still no evidence of the death of a soldier.

02.02.2024 12:51

In Ekaterinburg, the trial of the accused of the murder of an aspirant from Gabon began

Njelassili was killed in a fight in the centre of Catherineburg at the end of August 2023.

02.02.2024 12:42

In Volgograd, the Truck Market was burned.

The report on the fire was immediately on the fire control remote.

02.02.2024 12:34

In the Below City region, the Fur has been demolished by a land-based pedestrian crossing

According to preliminary information, no one was injured in the accident.

02.02.2024 12:29

In Len oblastia, the teacher was harassed to a class 4 student.

The boy's parents contacted the police who saw the correspondence.

02.02.2024 11:16

The drunken village of Nosok flew into the hospital at a snowstorm and died on the spot before the doctors arrived.

The HMVD on the Krasnoyarsk edge clarified the details of the incident.

02.02.2024 11:00

In Tumen province, the hunter wounded a retired in the stomach during the bobble hunting, the shooter was detained by the police

The perpetrator was a 47-year-old oil man from Tumeni.

02.02.2024 08:36

Eleven people with acute food poisoning were hospitalized in Irkutsk, of whom two were children

Igor Kobzeev, Governor of Irkut province, briefed on some details of the incident.

02.02.2024 08:18

The number of victims in the Bishkek accident increased to five, two of them in a very difficult situation

The departmental press reported on the condition of people injured during the ER.

02.02.2024 06:19

In Sahalina, the electrician will be sentenced to 67 million roubles for manipulation, and the offender will face up to 5 years ' imprisonment.

The Ministry of Internal Affairs Press Service for the Region explained that the chief criminal case had been a 62-year-old resident of Leningrad province.

02.02.2024 05:58

In Len oblastai, a multi-child mother lived in an apartment with a husband ' s mummy, prohibiting children from complaining about it outside.

Together with the remains, men lived and four of his children.

02.02.2024 03:07

Large poacher catches were taken from a local citizen ' s cartoon, and the poacher reached 507 kg of red paint.

The Centre for Public Relations (CCE) of the Russian Federation informed that the cost of delicate was 3.5 million roubles.
